/* ============ RESET / BASE ============ */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  color: #0a0a0a;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  padding: 0;
}

a {
  color: #0a66c2;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

a:hover {
  color: #004182;
}

h1, h2, h3 {
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
}

h3 {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  color: #444;
}

/* ============ LAYOUT ============ */
main {
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 4rem 1rem;
}

/* ============ NAVIGATION ============ */
header {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
  padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
}

header nav ul {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  list-style: none;
  gap: 2rem;
}

header nav a {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #0a0a0a;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ============ SECTIONS ============ */
section {
  margin-bottom: 5rem;
}

section h2 {
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

/* ============ FORMULAIRE ============ */
form {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

input, textarea {
  padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.2s ease;
}

input:focus, textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #0a66c2;
}

button {
  background-color: #0a66c2;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
  background-color: #004182;
}

/* ============ FOOTER ============ */
footer {
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  padding: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #777;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
}

/* ============ RESPONSIVE ============ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  header nav ul {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
  }

  h1 {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  h2 {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }

  main {
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
  }
}

  line-height: 1.6;
  padding: 0;
}

html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}



h1, h2, h3 {
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
}

h3 {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  color: #444;
}

/* ============ LAYOUT ============ */
main {
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 4rem 1rem;
}

/* ============ NAVIGATION ============ */
header {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
  padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
}

header nav ul {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  list-style: none;
  gap: 2rem;
}

header nav a {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #0a0a0a;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ============ SECTIONS ============ */
section {
  margin-bottom: 5rem;
}

section h2 {
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

/* ============ FORMULAIRE ============ */
form {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

input, textarea {
  padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.2s ease;
}

input:focus, textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #0a66c2;
}

button {
  background-color: #0a66c2;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
  background-color: #004182;
}

/* ============ FOOTER ============ */
footer {
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  padding: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #777;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
}

/* ============ RESPONSIVE ============ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  header nav ul {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
  }

  h1 {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  h2 {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }

  main {
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
  }
}

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const isVisible = ref(true)
let lastScrollY = window.scrollY

const handleScroll = () => {
  const currentScrollY = window.scrollY

  if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY || currentScrollY < 10) {
    isVisible.value = true  // Scroll up
  } else {
    isVisible.value = false // Scroll down
  }

  lastScrollY = currentScrollY
}

onMounted(() => {
  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})
</script>

import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const isOpen = ref(false)
const isVisible = ref(true)
const hasScrolled = ref(false)

let lastScrollY = window.scrollY

const toggleMenu = () => {
  isOpen.value = !isOpen.value
}

const closeMenu = () => {
  isOpen.value = false
}

const handleScroll = () => {
  const currentScrollY = window.scrollY

  // Affiche ou cache la navbar selon direction du scroll
  isVisible.value = currentScrollY < lastScrollY || currentScrollY < 10

  // Active la classe .scrolled dÃ¨s quâ€™on descend un peu
  hasScrolled.value = currentScrollY > 10

  lastScrollY = currentScrollY
}

onMounted(() => {
  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const isOpen = ref(false)
const isClosing = ref(false)
const isVisible = ref(true)
const hasScrolled = ref(false)

let lastScrollY = window.scrollY

// GÃ¨re l'ouverture / fermeture avec animation
const toggleMenu = () => {
  if (isOpen.value) {

    setTimeout(() => {

// GÃ¨re lâ€™apparition / disparition de la navbar selon scroll direction
const handleScroll = () => {
  const currentScrollY = window.scrollY

  isVisible.value = currentScrollY < lastScrollY || currentScrollY < 10
  hasScrolled.value = currentScrollY > 10

  lastScrollY = currentScrollY
}

onMounted(() => {
  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const isVisible = ref(true)
let lastScrollY = window.scrollY

const handleScroll = () => {
  const currentScrollY = window.scrollY

  if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY || currentScrollY < 10) {
    isVisible.value = true  // Scroll up
  } else {
    isVisible.value = false // Scroll down
  }

  lastScrollY = currentScrollY
}

onMounted(() => {
  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})
</script>

    isOpen.value = true
  }
}

const closeMenu = () => {
  isClosing.value = true
  setTimeout(() => {
    isOpen.value = false
    isClosing.value = false
  }, 300)
}

// GÃ¨re lâ€™apparition / disparition de la navbar selon scroll direction
const handleScroll = () => {
  const currentScrollY = window.scrollY

  isVisible.value = currentScrollY < lastScrollY || currentScrollY < 10
  hasScrolled.value = currentScrollY > 10

  lastScrollY = currentScrollY
}

onMounted(() => {
  window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
})
</script>
